mywords.name: A seed started growing
mywords.content: A seed started to grow after a college mentioned to me “I think you should fit as a fronted developer”. I finally made the decision and took on the challenge at the Technigo Javascript Bootcamp.

mywords.name: Another article
mywords.content: Lorem español dolor sit amet, tortilla con queso elit. Enchiladas viverra chorizo, tacos dignissim burrito. Salsa magna guacamole, quesadilla amor tamal.
